query.formula: strategy opt = minE(globalTime + penalty)[<=MAXTIME]{movement0.location, taskExe0.location, movement1.location, taskExe1.location, iteration[0], iteration[1], tf[0][0],tf[0][1],tf[0][2],tf[0][3],tf[0][4],tf[0][5],tf[0][6],tf[0][7],tf[0][8],tf[0][9],tf[1][0],tf[1][1],tf[1][2],tf[1][3],tf[1][4],tf[1][5],tf[1][6],tf[1][7],tf[1][8],tf[1][9]}->{}:<> ((forall(i:int[0,AgentNum-1]) iteration[i]>=MaxIteration))
